name: @grateful/eslint-config-node-bundle
description: ESLint bundle for NodeJS projects at Grateful Ventures

scripts.bundle-publish: npm run bundle-dependencies update; git commit -m 'Bundled dependencies.' ./package.json; git push; rm -fr ./node_modules; npm install --production $(bundle-dependencies list-bundled-dependencies); npm dedupe; npm prune; npm publish; npm install;

author: Grateful Ventures, LLC
